Params[3]: Miss Luna is following the Gray Ravens tightly. She will be there soon.
If you greet them with this current setup, Miss Luna will be sorely disappointed.
I know, I know. I'm working on it.
You seem to be enjoying yourself a little too much.
Well, Mr. Gabriel, you need to learn to calm your nerves from time to time, you know?
I don't know why you find it funny. Anyhow, do not disappoint Miss Luna.
Ah, that little... Not just without nerves, he doesn't even have a sense of humor...
